# kion_label (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "kion_label" "cost_center_x" {
  key   = "cost_center"
  value = "x"
  color = "#123abc"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `color` (String) The color of the label in hex format, (#123abc)
- `key` (String)
- `value` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
